synopsis.text:
Whether you're an idol enthusiast or simply enjoy watching dreams unfold, "Aikatsu!" offers a captivating journey into the world of aspiring celebrities. At the heart of the story are two best friends, Aoi Kiriya and Ichigo Hoshimiya, who decide to apply to the prestigious Starlight Academy, a renowned institution known for nurturing top young stars in the entertainment industry. Inspired by the world's biggest idol, Mizuki Kanzaki, the girls hope to emulate her brilliance and positively impact the lives of others.

As first-year middle school students, Ichigo and Aoi find their lives transformed upon entering Starlight Academy. They encounter a diverse range of talented rivals and forge lifelong friendships while mastering the essential skills required to become successful idols. With the help of mysterious Aikatsu! cards, Ichigo embraces various challenges and auditions, continually pushing her limits to grow and shine.

Throughout their time at the academy, the girls experience countless adventures, from chopping down Christmas trees and tackling obstacle courses to rock climbing and more. "Aikatsu!" beautifully captures the laughter, camaraderie, and heartbreak that come with pursuing one's dreams, making it an engaging and inspiring watch for audiences of all ages.
